original_title: Chicago Blues Jam: Hubert Sumlin / Rod Piazza
overview: Known for its sizzling Monday-night jam sessions and impressive weekend marquee, the Chicago stage at Buddy Guy's Legends (owned by its celebrated namesake) has played host to some of the most talented blues artists in the world. This installment of the Chicago Blues Jam series features memorable performances by Hubert Sumlin and Rod Piazza, an "old dog" and a "new dog" who both have plenty of tricks.
title: Chicago Blues Jam: Hubert Sumlin / Rod Piazza
